getService

public <T extends AludraService> T getService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
Description copied from interface: AludraContext
Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context. The service will be wrapped with registered service wrappers, so operations on this service will be logged.

Specified by:
getService in interface AludraContext
Parameters:
serviceId - Service ID for the service.
Returns:
The service object for use.

getNonLoggingService

public <T extends AludraService> T getNonLoggingService(ComponentId<T> serviceId)
Description copied from interface: AludraContext
Provides a service with the given component ID for use within this context. The service will not be wrapped with registered service wrappers, so operations on this service will not be logged or otherwise noticed.

Specified by:
getNonLoggingService in interface AludraContext
Parameters:
serviceId - Service ID for the service.
Returns:
The service object for use.

                     TestStatus status)
Description copied from interface: AludraTestContext
Reports an execution failure to the framework.

Specified by:
logError in interface AludraTestContext
Parameters:
errorMessage - the error message assigned to the failure.

logError

public void logError(String errorMessage,
                     Throwable t)
Description copied from interface: AludraTestContext
Reports an execution error (a kind of "uncaught" exception) to the framework.

Specified by:
logError in interface AludraTestContext
Parameters:
errorMessage - the error message assigned to the error. Can be the message of the exception.
t - the Throwable to be reported.
